items.sentence: I believe Tom really plans on doing that this week.
I didn't realize that you didn't understand French?
You still need to choose what you're going to wear.
Tom was aware that Mary couldn't understand French.
Tom stays up until after midnight almost every day.
Tom adamantly denied being involved in the robbery.
After Tom started crying, Mary started crying, too.
Tom said that he's definitely not going to do that.
Do you think that there's a chance you can do that?
I've already given you a lot of chances to do that.
